data.title: Penn Badgley – Bio, Wife (Domino Kirke), Dating, Girlfriend, Height
data.meta_description: Penn Badgley is an American actor and musician. He is known as the lonely boy, Dan Humphrey in his melodramatic role on The CW series
data.text:
Penn Badgley is an American actor and musician. He is known as the lonely boy, Dan Humphrey in his melodramatic role on The CW series Gossip Girl (2007-12) which was his ticket to fame, as well as the creepy bookstore owner, Joe in You. He has also starred in numerous films, including John Tucker Must Die (2006), Stepfather (2009), and Cymbeline (2015). Penn is currently the lead singer of the Brooklyn-based indie band Mother (aka MOTHXR).

the biography

The MOTHXR frontman was born as Penn DaytonBadgley on November 1, 1986 in Baltimore, Maryland to Lynne Murphy and Duff Badgley. His father was a newspaper reporter and carpenter, as well as a 2008 Washington Green Party gubernatorial candidate. His parents divorced when he was 12, and his childhood years were split between Woodlake, Virginia, and Seattle (Washington).

He attended Woolridge Primary School where his mother became president of ZEP although he completed his primary education at St. Christopher’s School. Penn Badgley was interested in many things while doing athletics, acting, and singing. He played youth football in a team coached by his father and started playing at an early age. He attended Charles Wright Academy in Tacoma, Washington, and joined the Seattle Children’s Theater. Keen to do what he loves and have fun, he soon started doing vocals for the children’s radio station.

He turned his love for the craft into a career at the age of 11 when he moved to Hollywood. Combined with his love for performing, he also sought a singing career and recorded a pop single in 1998. At age 14, he completed his California High School skills exam and began attending Santa Monica College . After graduating, he was accepted to the University of Southern California, but had to defer admission due to contractual obligations. Nonetheless, he later enrolled at Lewis & Clark College, a private liberal arts college in Portland, Oregon, where he graduated in 2005.

Career

Penn has made strides in her career while focusing on the big picture all the time. He started out doing voice acting for the video games Mario Golf 64 and Mario Tennis 64 in 1999 and 2000 respectively. He made his screen debut in an episode of Will & Grace after which he had more roles in shows such as Daddio, The García Brothers, and What I Like About You. In no time, he started rising to prominence and establishing his presence in the industry.

From 2000 to 2001, he got his first regular role as Phillip Chancellor IV on the soap opera The Young and the Restless which also earned him his first nomination: 2001 Young Artist Award for Best Performance in a Daytime Series. Since then, he has acted in more than 10 television series and in films. Her television credits include The WB’s Beginning Again (2002), The Mountain (2004-2005), The Bedford Diaries (2006), What I Like About You (2002), The Twilight Zone (2003), The Slap (2015).

His ticket to fame came in 2007 when he appeared as the main cast of The CW’s teen TV series, Gossip Girl. He starred as Daniel ‘Dan’ Humphrey from 2007 to 2012 in 121 episodes across six seasons. In 2018, he also played the lead role of Joe Goldberg in You which is scheduled for release on September 9, 2018.

Apart from his television career, Penn Badgley is also prominent in movies. He had minor roles in The Fluffer (2000) and Debating Robert Lee (2003), however, his starring role came in 2006 when he was cast as Scott Tucker in John Tucker Must Die which became a box office hit. in its first week. His other works include Drive-thru (2007) Still Loud (2008), The Stepfather (2009), Easy (2010), Margin Call (2011), Greetings from Tim Buckley (2012), Pieces per Billion (2014) , Cymbeline(2015), The Paper Shop (2016), Adam Green’s Aladdin (201 6)

Penn is also entrenched in his music career. he is the lead singer of the group, MOTHXR. They logged into SoundCloud as MOTHER and released their song. Easy on the website in 2014. The following year, the band signed with the Kitsuné and Washington Square Music labels and released their debut album, Centerfold on February 26, 2016.

Wife – Domino Kirke, Dating, Girlfriend

The Gossip Girl actor previously dated his co-star, Blake Lively, who portrayed Serena van der Woodsen from 2007 to 2010. They met on set and managed to keep their relationship private and when they broke up, they also did a good job hiding it from the team..

He also dated Zoe Kravitz from 2011 to 2013. Their relationship, however, was low-key and their split amicable. They would have called it quitting to focus on their careers.

Penn began a relationship with the British-American singer Domino Kirke in 2014. Domino is the daughter of Simon Kirke, drummer for Free and Bad Company and owner of the Geminola boutique in SoHo, Lorraine. She is the sister of Daughters actress Jemima Kirke and Lola Kirke who is also an actress.

She was part of the DOMINO group and has also worked as a doula (a person trained to help women during childbirth) since 2009, co-founding her own doula business, Carriage House Doulas.

Penn and Domino were married in New York on February 27, 2017. Upon marrying his wife, he became stepfather to her son, Cassius (born 2009), from a previous relationship with musician Morgan O’Kane. They held a second wedding in June 2017 in an outdoor ceremony with celebs Mariska Hargitay, Zac Posen and Debra Messing on their guest list.

Penn Badgley Height

Penn is not only handsome and talented, but also has good height to support his aesthetic. He is 1.75m tall.
